=Banyan VINES Protocols=
  * A copy of the [http://banyan.bamertal.com/Banyan-supplier-help/ProtoDef/ProtoDefMain.htm VINES Protocol Definition] documents (crucial for anyone interested in implementing the protocol in any manner, or understanding how it works) have been found 
  * Additional resources of interest are available [http://banyan.bamertal.com/ here]

==Banyan VINES IP==
  * EtherType is {{{0x0bad}}}
  * Currently supported by [http://www.wireshark.org Wireshark]
  
=LANtastic=
  * EtherType is {{{0x81d7}}}
  * Currently not supported by [http://www.wireshark.org Wireshark]
  * A sample traffic capture file is [http://understand.googlecode.com/files/LANtastic_Broadcasts.pcap here]
  * Also makes use of the UDP-based [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NetBIOS#Datagram_distribution_service NetBIOS Datagram Service protocol]
  * Possible to install the reference implementation under Windows Vista/7 with some work

=DEC DNA Routing=
  * EtherType is {{{0x6003}}}
  * Currently supported by [http://www.wireshark.org Wireshark]

="Raw" NetBIOS=
  * It is possible to install Microsoft's implementation (from Windows XP) under Windows Vista/7, according to [http://www.mac-net.com/174984.page this page]
